title: Ammi: Letter to a Democratic Mother
description: Through the fable of Jahanara Begum and Nusrat Beg, Saeed Mirza tells the love story of two extraordinary people by reimagining the lives of his parents. Combative and lyrical, moving and relentlessly inquiring, "Ammi" offers a way of seeing our history and our future that is impossible to ignore.
author: Saeed Akhtar Mirza
